Articles.Content:
Hello.

I have seen the "OMGZ 0.20 EEZ BOOGD PLZ FEX SADAFGHAKFAFAAZZ" threads, and this could be classed as another one of those, if it wasn't for this singly unique bug.

My game refuses to launch any rocket. ANY ROCKET. Won't launch from VAB. Won't launch from SPH. Won't even launch from launchpad. It's an annoying bug which sort of spits in my face and says "Nope beeotch, you ain't playin' 0.20". Which really puts a dampener on the 0.20 hype for me.

TL;DR: Game won't launch rockets, any help is appreciated.
This should be in the KSP development board. And also, what makes you think the game is spitting in your face? The devs didn't put it there on purpose you know.

Uninstall, delete any and all files within the folder, double-check the registry, and then reinstall.

I have issues with the latest iteration, but it's entirely my system's fault. Usually, a clean install will negate issues in the beginning, and then you can adjust from there as you go along.
